name: tm12
effect: Teaches Taunt to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Taunt to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II: Sweet Scent Gen I: Water Gun)

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: Enrages the foe so it can only use attack moves.
flavor_text.emerald: Enrages the foe so it can only use attack moves.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: The foe is taunted into a rage that allows it to use only attack moves.
